name: Misplaced •
description:
Watch carefully the star moving and its light. To continue through this atmospheric space you will have to carefully move the misplaced ones to give them life and open the doors.

Global Game Jam 2021

Controls:

-Move: ZQSD or WASD
-Grab Misplaced: Left click
-Rewind star: Right click  

Credits: 

  • Coralie Feniello • Game and Level Design
  • Theo Verpillat • Sound Design and Level Build
  • Sebastien Violier • Programming and Shader artist
